The Atanas

8 String

The Atanas 8-String
Our first line of instruments, the Atanas 8-string features a rich, deep tone and enormous range.
  • 8 strings
  • Fanned frets
  • 9000 in scale length
  • A body
  • B fretboard
  • C neck
  • ASDF pickups
  • 1,000,000 ohm potentiometers
  • Enchanted tuners
